name.ja: <ruby>蒼<rt>そう</rt></ruby><ruby>救<rt>きゅう</rt></ruby>の<ruby>一<rt>いっ</rt></ruby><ruby>閃<rt>せん</rt></ruby> ディグレイス

requirement.en: Send the top card of your Deck to the Graveyard.

effect.en:
● This card gains ATK equal to [the number of face-up Celestial Warrior Type monsters on your field] x 1000 until the end of this turn.
● This turn, this card can make up to 2 attacks on monsters.

materials.en: "Dunkes the Skysavior Knight" + "Soleil the Skysavior Angel"

ja.set_name: Deck Mod Pack: Double Star of the Assault!!
